title: 104_s675
content: Directs the Administrator of General Services to establish a program through the use of the Federal acquisition computer network (FACNET) architecture to provide Government-wide, on-line computer access to information on products and services that are available for ordering through multiple award schedules. Requires the inclusion of certain competitive bidding requirements in the multiple award schedule program. Requires the Administrator to establish a four-year pilot program to test streamlined procedures for the procurement of products and services available for ordering through the multiple award schedules. Requires the Comptroller General to review the pilot program and report the results to specified congressional committees.
